About Gangneung

Introduction to Gangneung City

Small but well-liked City

Perfect holiday weather with cool breeze and plenty of sunshine all year around

Population
210,294 (as of 2023)
Floating Population
32,000,000 year

Olympic City

Home to Winter Olympics 2018 & Winter Youth Olympic 2024 Friendly and civil residents & Barrier-free city

Festive City

Homeland to all-year-round festivals Array of tour/festival programs exclusively available in October

K-Culture City

Epicenter of iconic K-Drama filming locations Heavenly sanctuary to K-pop fans
